name: Walking Bridge
how_to_perform:
1. Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, then walk out onto your hands with your fingers pointing forward.
2. Walk your hands slightly forward and start to lift one foot up high towards the ceiling and slowly lower it back down to meet the other.

Keep your core engaged throughout the exercise to maintain proper form.

3. Alternate which foot goes up high while keeping the other foot on the ground, creating a bridging motion with your legs.
short_summary: Walking bridges are an effective calfs exercise that require little equipment, focusing on rapid ankle extensions and flexions, similar in nature to single-leg hops.
alternative_names: Single-Leg Hops with Alternating Ankle Dorsiflexion
